attributes.action: restore the authority of the sovereign over parliment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
give the power of England back to the sovereign and away from parliment.i know we need parliment for laws ect
but when things go wrong like they are now the ordinary person has no recourse and has to wait for elections,parliment is supposed to serve the people not its self.
we ask that the crown to step in and serve its country like we are expected to do.to be able to disolve parliments- remove peers who dishonour their peerage,to remove any and all politicians who discredit the house of commons,to act for the people and on behalf of the people of England.
goverments change,the lords change,mp's change and we need a higher body to be able to control and to act for the people when situations like what is going on now.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
